details: Team project. Key features and my contribution to the project- Implements user authentication with admin and user role-based access control dashboard. Implements complete Blog feature. Explores Mongoose with MongoDB database as a new technology

websiteName: Pawspalace: Pet Adoption And Donation Platform
details: This project integrates Firebase for authentication, MongoDB for CRUD operations, React.js for the frontend, Express.js for the backend and includes Stripe for payment options. There also implemented user/admin role.
The library management software named BookByte developed using React with CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality and JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for authentication and security.
